pullRequest.bodyText:
Old PR:  #1752
Checklist


 the contributor license agreement is signed
 commit message follows commit guidelines
 tests are included

autotests not setup for Blackboard integration tests


 screenshots are included showing significant UI changes
 documentation is changed or added

Via openequella/openequella.github.io#55



Description of change
Blackboard REST MVP ( looking to keep the number of commits into Dev small since I'll likely need to backport this into 2019.1 / 2019.2 / 2020.0 ) ( https://github.com/openequella/openEQUELLA/issues?q=is%3Aopen+label%3A%22Integration+-+Bb+LTI%2FREST%22+milestone%3A2020.2 ):
Included:

Blackboard 3-Legged-OAuth now working ( #821 )
Retrieve courses by user (instead of all courses) ( #846 )
Blackboard rate limit stats exposed via the audit logs and log4j logs ( #853 )
Blackboard course caching improvement ( #819 )
General clean up due to D2L code copy
General testing

commit.message: #821 trival change to kick off formatting
#821 another trival change for testing local hooks

nodes.bodyText: Still got a lot of references to D2L in here. Probably worth going through to reword comments and change identifiers - so that the different connectors don't become coupled together and hard to maintain.
Can we have more readable parameter names or  a brief description ?
Why not combine these two constants and the = into one constant?
May I ask why use hexadecimal numbers and what they mean?
OEQ provides tools that check strings. You can call Check.isEmpty(query) to do the check.
Can we have an example that matches this pattern ?
Is it possible to reuse this class com.tle.web.oauth.response.ErrorResponse?
